benchmarks.name: benchmark-articulations
benchmarks.title: benchmark-articulations.etherscore.json
benchmarks.description: Error during processing
benchmarks.notes: Error: Error: Invalid note format: "G4:q.bend-1". Expected format: {pitch}{octave}:{duration}[tN][articulation][.jazzArt][.ornament][@velocity][+/-timing][?probability] (e.g., "C4:q", "C4:q*", "C4:q@0.8", "C4:8t3", "C4:q.fall", "C4:q.tr")

benchmarks.name: benchmark-automation
benchmarks.title: Automation Benchmark
benchmarks.description: Tests section automation: tempo (ritardando/accelerando), filter cutoff, semantic parameters (brightness), and all curve types (linear, exponential, logarithmic, sine, step).
benchmarks.notes: MIDI exported. Spectrogram requires WAV rendering in browser.

benchmarks.name: benchmark-chords
benchmarks.title: benchmark-chords.etherscore.json
benchmarks.description: Error during processing
benchmarks.notes: Error: Error: Invalid chord format: "C7sus4:w". Expected format: {root}{quality}[@voicing]:{duration}[articulation] (e.g., "Cmaj7:w", "Dm:h", "Am7:q*", "Am9@drop2:w")

benchmarks.name: benchmark-continuation
benchmarks.title: Continuation Benchmark
benchmarks.description: Tests melodic continuation with all 5 techniques: ascending_sequence, descending_sequence, extension, fragmentation, and development.
benchmarks.notes: MIDI exported. Spectrogram requires WAV rendering in browser.

benchmarks.name: benchmark-density-tension
benchmarks.title: benchmark-density-tension.etherscore.json
benchmarks.description: Error during processing
benchmarks.notes: Error: Error: Invalid rest format: "r:q?0.3". Expected format: r:{duration} (e.g., "r:q", "r:h")

benchmarks.name: benchmark-drums
benchmarks.title: benchmark-drums.etherscore.json
benchmarks.description: Error during processing
benchmarks.notes: Error: Error: Invalid pitch: "drum:kick@909"

benchmarks.name: benchmark-dynamics
benchmarks.title: Dynamics Benchmark
benchmarks.description: Tests velocity and dynamics features: pp-ff markings, velocity values, velocity envelopes (crescendo, diminuendo, swell), and humanization.
benchmarks.notes: MIDI exported. Spectrogram requires WAV rendering in browser.

benchmarks.name: benchmark-effects
benchmarks.title: Effects Benchmark
benchmarks.description: Tests all effect types in isolation. Each section applies a different effect to the same source sound for comparison.
benchmarks.notes: MIDI exported. Spectrogram requires WAV rendering in browser.

benchmarks.name: benchmark-euclidean
benchmarks.title: benchmark-euclidean.etherscore.json
benchmarks.description: Error during processing
benchmarks.notes: Error: Error: Invalid pitch: "drum:rim@909"

benchmarks.name: benchmark-generative
benchmarks.title: Generative Features Benchmark
benchmarks.description: Tests Markov chain generation with all 5 presets (uniform, neighbor_weighted, walking_bass, melody_stepwise, root_heavy), seeded reproducibility, and scale-aware generation.
benchmarks.notes: MIDI exported. Spectrogram requires WAV rendering in browser.

benchmarks.name: benchmark-layering
benchmarks.title: Layering Benchmark
benchmarks.description: Tests v0.8 instrument layering: multiple presets stacked, detune offsets, octave doubling, and volume balancing.
benchmarks.notes: MIDI exported. Spectrogram requires WAV rendering in browser.

benchmarks.name: benchmark-lfo
benchmarks.title: LFO Benchmark
benchmarks.description: Tests v0.8 LFO modulation: different rates (sync to tempo), shapes (sine, triangle, square, sawtooth), and targets (filterCutoff, pan, volume, pitch).
benchmarks.notes: MIDI exported. Spectrogram requires WAV rendering in browser.

benchmarks.name: benchmark-mary-lamb
benchmarks.title: Mary Had a Little Lamb
benchmarks.description: Reference melody for comparing EtherDAW rendering against raw synthesis. Uses electric piano preset.
benchmarks.notes: MIDI exported. Spectrogram requires WAV rendering in browser.

benchmarks.name: benchmark-synthesis
benchmarks.title: Synthesis Benchmark
benchmarks.description: Tests all synth presets. Each plays C4 for one whole note at 60 BPM (4 seconds per note). Use for visual/audio comparison after code changes.
benchmarks.notes: MIDI exported. Spectrogram requires WAV rendering in browser.

benchmarks.name: benchmark-timing
benchmarks.title: benchmark-timing.etherscore.json
benchmarks.description: Error during processing
benchmarks.notes: Error: Error: Invalid pitch: "drum:kick@909"

benchmarks.name: benchmark-transforms
benchmarks.title: Pattern Transforms Benchmark
benchmarks.description: Tests pattern transformations (invert, retrograde, augment, diminish, transpose, octave) and pattern inheritance (extends/overrides).
benchmarks.notes: MIDI exported. Spectrogram requires WAV rendering in browser.

benchmarks.name: benchmark-voice-leading
benchmarks.title: Voice Leading Benchmark
benchmarks.description: Tests constraint-based voice leading with 4-voice chorale, style presets (bach, jazz, pop), and custom voice ranges.
benchmarks.notes: MIDI exported. Spectrogram requires WAV rendering in browser.
